Blog.post: today... practise some hockey dribbling... well still need lots more practise... well... suling... it's really nice to hear from u... yes... i will find u if i need help... personally, i muz learn to be more relaz...take things less seriously... haiz.... well, i'm workin on it...

maybe i'm really petty... well... i really cant stand it when pple lie to me... most of e times, when they lie... i wont believe them ever again... but... it take time for me to have trust in them... but most of them juz disappoint me... whether it's a harmless joke or not... it all matter to me... maybe i'm juz too serious...
alamak.... soon got common test... i wanna die... first time in my life i actually so worried abt failing maths... n chemistry too... but... will continue to study harder...

haiz... pple always get e wrong message... i juz another protector... dat's Lucifer... but... dat Lucifer... dun wanna share job wit whitelighter... now i really dun noe wat to do... i dun wanna hurt e whitelighter's n Lucifer's feeling... i'm in a dilemma now... wat should i do archangel??? pls help me... cant i be a bit greedy to haf both???

miss my tennis today... still not able to wake up... coz too tired... really upset... den got bad running nose now... hope it will be cure soon... or else... monday's test cant concentrate... i think... everyone is confused abt me hiring Lucifer... actually juz needed more protection... whitelighter is not fired lah... now eating an delicious egg tart.... very crunchy n sweet... can intro to u guys... it is from bukit batok...muz try!!! i noe dat there is bird flu going around... but i juz cant resist!!!!

well, there is maths paper tomolo... not sure whether i can handle it... been a long time since i'm actually worried abt maths paper... dis time... i'm juz not sure... why?? maybe didnt do enough preparations??? no... did many qns liao... everything seems fine... tomolo... i'm not sure whether i should go for japanese class... most probably cant concentrate... coz day after tomolo, there's ipc... another scary module... really wonder if e paper's gonna be tough??? hope not... well, maybe i really should skip dis japanese class for once...
